content: **materials ** worsted weight yarn in light brown dark brown light blue dark blue pink crochet thread in black e hook 3 50 mm stuffing 6 mm safety eyes scissors tapestry needle **difficulty ** medium you should know how to work in the round increase decrease and work in the back loops final piece should measure approximately 8 tall this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2014-2015 do not claim as your own do not copy sell or distribute this pattern do not sell any products made from this pattern cookie mouse belongs to laura numeroff
